item.title: Open-sources and Apps
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Gen AI Hands On Practices Google Colab Hands-on practice for developing Gen AI applications, and understanding the concepts. ☞ Github ☞ Learn More SSO Proxy A lightweight proxy tool for accessing APIs and websites that require SSO authentication. It uses Puppeteer to open a browser window for login and then reuses the authenticated cookies to access the proxied URL. This tool is particularly helpful for: Showcasing integration with portal APIs that require SSO (before SSO is actually set up).
